content.raw:
Thinking a bit more about it I would be happy with something like:

* Provide a cmake variable, something like LOW_MEM_TESTING, which can activate a scaled version of the tests which need a lot of RAM.
* Tests will check how much memory is currently available and if not enough, it will skip the test.

This way we can control when original version or scaled is run and even avoid the run when the memory is not enough. I will implement this version unless somebody has a better idea.
